entry.p: Amend section 2.101 in paragraph (b)(2) by adding paragraph (4) to the definition “HUBZone contract”.
Amend section 4.803 in paragraph (a)(6) by removing “decision” and adding “decision (see 19.506)” in its place.
Amend section 4.1202 by revising paragraphs (a) introductory text and (a)(14).
Amend section 4.1202 by revising paragraphs (a) introductory text and (a)(14).
Amend section 7.104 by removing from the first sentence of paragraph (d) “entirely reserved or” and adding “totally” in its place.
Amend section 8.404 in the first sentence in paragraph (a) by removing “requirement at 19.202-1(e)(1)(iii))” and adding “requirements at 19.102(b)(3) and 19.202-1(e)(1)(iii))” in its place.
Amend section 8.405-5 in the first sentence of paragraph (b) by removing “against” and adding “under” in its place and revising the second and last sentences.
Amend section 10.001 by— a.Removing from paragraph (a)(3)(vii) “and”;
d.Removing from newly designated paragraph (a)(3)(ix) “Subpart 39.2” and adding “subpart 39.2” in its place.
Amend section 10.002 by revising paragraph (b)(1)(vii) and

Amend section 13.003 in paragraph (b)(1) by removing “are reserved exclusively for small business concerns and” and by removing “shall be set aside” and adding in its place “shall be set aside for small business concerns”
Amend section 16.505 by— a. Adding paragraphs (a)(7)(ix) and
c. Adding a paragraph (b)(5) subject heading;
d. Revising the paragraph (b)(6) subject heading; and
Amend section 19.000 by— a. Removing from paragraph (a)(3) “aside” and adding “aside, in total or in part,” in its place;
c. Removing the period at the end of paragraph (a)(9) and adding “; and” in its place; and
Amend section 19.001 by removing the definition “Nonmanufacturer rule” and adding in alphabetical order a definition for “Nonmanufacturer”.
Amend section 19.201 by— a. Revising the second sentence of paragraph (c) introductory text;
b. Removing from paragraph (c)(1) “Director of” and adding “Director of the Office of” in its place, in two places; and
Amend section 19.202-1 by revising paragraphs (e)(1) introductory text and
Amend section 19.202-4 in the introductory text by removing “must” and adding “shall” in its place; and
Amend section 19.202-5 in the introductory text by removing “must” and adding “shall” in its place and
Amend section 19.202-6 in paragraph (a)(1) by removing “set-asides” and adding “set-asides, and reserves” in its place.
Amend section 19.203 in paragraph (b) by removing “exclusively reserve” and adding “set aside” in its place.
Amend section 19.301-1 by— a. Revising paragraph (a);
b. Redesignating paragraphs (b) through (d) as paragraphs (f) through (h); and c. Adding new paragraphs (b) through
Amend section 19.302 by revising paragraphs (a) and (b)
Amend section 19.307 by removing and reserving paragraph (a) and
Amend section 19.309 by adding paragraph (a)(3) and
Amend section 19.403 in paragraph (c)(8) by removing “in 19.505” and adding “in 19.502-8” in its place.
Amend section 19.502-1 by— a.Removing from paragraph (a)(1) “Nations” and adding “Nation’s” in its place;
Amend section 19.502-2 by revising paragraphs (a) and
Amend newly designated section 19.502-6 by— a. Removing from paragraph (c)(2) “reserved for small business concerns” and adding “set aside” in its place; and
b. Removing from paragraph (d) “(see 19.506(a))” and the two occurrences of “procurement center representative” and adding “(see 19.502-9(a))” and “PCR” twice in their places.
Amend newly designated section 19.502-8 by— a. Revising paragraph (a); and
b. Removing from paragraph (b) the two occurrences of “procurement center representative” and adding “PCR” in their places and removing the two occurrences of “(or designee)”.
Amend newly designated section 19.502-9 by revising paragraph (a) and
removing from paragraph (b) “SBA representative” and “procurement center representative” and adding “SBA PCR” and “PCR” in their places, respectively. The revision reads as follows:
Redesignate section 19.508 as section 19.507 and revise paragraphs (c) through (f) and add paragraphs (g) and (h).

Amend section 19.602-3 in paragraph (a)(2) by removing “Director,” and “(OSDBU)” and adding “Director of the” and “(OSDBU) or, for the Department of Defense, the Director of the Office of Small Business Programs,” in their places, respectively.
Amend section 19.602-4 by adding a sentence to the end of paragraph (b).
Amend section 19.704 in paragraph (a) introductory text by removing “19.702(a)(1), (2), and (3)” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(i), (ii), and (iii)” in its place.
Amend section 19.705-1 in paragraph (b)(1) by removing “19.702(a)(1)” and adding “19.702(a)” in its place.
Amend section 19.705-2 in paragraph (f) by removing “19.702(a)(3)” and “re-representation” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(iii)” and “rerepresentation” in their place, respectively.
Amend section 19.705-5 in paragraph (b) by removing “19.702(a)(1) and (2)” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(i) and (ii)” in its place.
Amend section 19.707 in paragraph (a)(2) by removing “19.702(a)(1) or (2)” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(i) or (ii)” in its place.
Amend section 19.708 in paragraph (b)(1))(iv) by removing “19.702(a)(3)” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(iii)” in its place.
Amend section 19.804-2 by revising the first sentence of paragraph (a).

Amend section 19.810 in paragraph (b)(1)(ii) by removing “Director for Small” and “Director of” and adding “Director for the Office of Small” and “Director of the Office of” in their places, respectively.
Amend section 19.1307 by— a. Removing from paragraph (a)(1) “or”;
b. Removing the period from the end of paragraph (a)(2) and adding “; or” in its place; and

Amend newly designated section 19.1508 by— a. Redesignating paragraph (a) as paragraph (a)(1); b. Removing from the newly designated paragraph (a)(1) “or reserved”; c. Revising the second sentence of newly designated paragraph (a)(1);
Amend section 52.204-8 by— a. Revising the date of the provision;
Amend section 52.212-1 by revising the date of the provision and
Amend section 52.212-3 by— a. Revising the date of the provision; and
b. Removing from paragraph (b)(2) introductory text “business size standard” and “NAICS code” and adding “business size standard(s)” and “NAICS code(s)” in their place, respectively.
Amend section 52.212-5 by— a. Revising the date of the clause;
Amend section 52.219-1 by— a. Revising the date of the clause and

b. Removing paragraph (d)(1); c. Redesignating the paragraph (d)(2) introductory text as paragraph (d) introductory text;; d. Redesignating paragraphs (d)(2)(i) through (iii) as paragraphs (d)(1) through (3);
Amend section 52.219-3 by— a. Revising the introductory text, the date of the clause, and
b. Removing from paragraph (b)(1) “or reserved for,”;
d. Removing the period from the end of paragraph (b)(3) and adding “; and” in its place;
g. Removing paragraph (f); h. Redesignating paragraph (e) as paragraph (f); i. Adding new paragraph (e);
j. Removing from newly designated paragraph (f) “will” and adding “shall” in its place; and
Amend section 52.219-4 by— a. Revising the introductory text,
c. Removing paragraph (f); d. Redesignating paragraph (g) as paragraph (f); and
Amend section 52.219-6 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
c. Removing paragraph (d) and Alternate I; d. Redesignating Alternate II as Alternate I; and
e. Revising the date and the introductory text of the newly designated Alternate I.
Amend section 52.219-7 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
d. Removing Alternate I; and e. Redesignating Alternate II as Alternate I and revising it.
Amend section 52.219-9 by— a. Revising the date of the clause;
b. Removing from paragraph (l)(1)(ii)(B) “19.702(a)(3)” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(iii)” in its place;
c. Revising the date of Alternate III; and
d. Removing from paragraph (l)(1)(ii)(B) of Alternate III “19.702(a)(3)” and adding “19.702(a)(1)(iii)” in its place.
Amend section 52.219-13 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
b. Designating the undesignated paragraph as paragraph (b);
Amend section 52.219-14 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
d. Removing from paragraph (b)(3) “small business” and adding “small business concerns” in its place and removing the period at the end and adding “; and” in its place;
f. Revising paragraph (c) introductory text; and
Amend section 52.219-18 by revising the date of the clause and
d. Removing the period from the end of paragraph (b)(3) and adding “; and” in its place;
f. Revising the paragraph (d) subject heading;
g. Removing paragraph (f); h. Redesignating paragraph (e) as paragraph (f); and i. Adding new paragraph (e).
h. Redesignating paragraph (e) as paragraph (f); and
Amend section 52.219-28 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
b. Removing from the definition of “Small business concern” in paragraph (a) the phrase “paragraph (c)” and adding “paragraph (d)” in its place;
d. Designating paragraphs (c) through (g) as paragraphs (d) through (h); e. Adding new paragraph (c);
f. Removing from newly designated paragraph (d) the two occurrences of “code” and adding “code(s)” in their places;
i. Revising newly designated paragraph (h); and
Amend section 52.219-29 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
d. Removing from paragraph (b)(3) the period at the end and adding “; and” in its place;
f. Removing from paragraph (c)(1) “apparent successful offeror” and adding “EDWOSB concerns” in its place;
g.Removing from paragraph (c)(3) “contracting officer” and adding “Contracting Officer” in its place;
h. Revising the paragraph (d) subject heading;
i. Removing paragraph (f); j. Redesignating paragraph (e) as paragraph (f); and k.Adding new paragraph (e).
Amend section 52.219-30 by— a. Revising the introductory text and the date of the clause;
d. Removing from paragraph (b)(3) the period at the end and adding “; and” in its place;
f. Revising the paragraph (d) subject heading;
g. Removing paragraph (f); h. Redesignating paragraph (e) as paragraph (f); and i. Adding new paragraph (e).
